title: WTB/WTTF: T207's TONS of HOF tradebait
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: WTB/WTTF: T207's TONS of HOF tradebait
posts.post_content:
Slowly making progress on this very challenging set.  I am looking to buy or trade for the following T207s.  I will take them in any condition, even total beaters.  I'm mainly looking for lower grade for now.  I have included scans of some of my tradebait.  I also have more than 300 other T205, T206, T207, etc including many other HOF's, SL's and short prints available to trade for T207s that I need.  I'm not looking to sell right now, only trade.  Please feel free to e-mail or PM me with any offers, large or small.  Thanks very much.

My wantlist:

Here is some of what I have available to trade:

The T205 Chase and Wheat have been traded (thanks Kevin and Robert) but all others, as well as 300+ other T205, T206, and T207 cards remain available so please keep any trade offers coming.  Thanks for looking.
